URGENT REQUIREMENT
Hi,

Alphaeus HR is looking for Senior Manager - Quality/Testing, for their
client who is an American company having operations in Bangalore.  
Details
are mentioned below. Candidates who meet the requirements may send 
their
updated resumes to john@...

Kindly don't forget to mention the "Job Code" in the Subject line

Request you not to post your resumes to the group.


Warm Regards,
John Amirtharaj


Senior Manager - Quality/Testing (Job Code : SMQ-Y01)

* 10+ years of experience in testing, Quality Management of projects /
Products being developed using J2EE, Dot Net and other cutting edge
technologies
* Experience in core Java API testing using JUnit / Cactus
* Experience in Java server side testing
* Experience in installation testing on SunOne iPlanet, Apache, IBM
Websphere, Resin
* Experience in Silk and/or Load Runner (not WinRunner), Test Director
* Experience in test planning
* Knowledge in various testing methodologies
* Experience in Testing Financial Applications


Warm Regards,
John Amirtharaj
Head - Staffing Solutions
AlphaeusHR

Phone : +91-80-56998335
Email : john@...
